nodes.documentation:
Abort the purchase and reclaim the ether.
 Can only be called by the seller before
 the contract is locked.
nodes.name: cancel

nodes.documentation:
Confirm the purchase as buyer.
 Transaction has to include `2 * value` ether.
 The ether will be locked until confirmReceived
 is called.
nodes.name: confirmPurchase

nodes.documentation:
Confirm that you (the buyer) received the item.
 This will release the locked ether.
nodes.name: confirmReceived

nodes.documentation:

 the contract is locked.
nodes.name: cancel

nodes.documentation:
Confirm the purchase as buyer.
 Transaction has to include `2 * value` ether.
 The ether will be locked until confirmReceived
 is called.
nodes.name: confirmPurchase

nodes.documentation:

 This will release the locked ether.
nodes.name: confirmReceived

cancel().notice: Abort the purchase and reclaim the ether. Can only be called by the seller before the contract is locked.

confirmPurchase().notice: Confirm the purchase as buyer. Transaction has to include `2 * value` ether. The ether will be locked until confirmReceived is called.

confirmReceived().notice: Confirm that you (the buyer) received the item. This will release the locked ether.
